xdrive.title: Product Tester and Copywriter
duties: Tested and provided feedback on digital storage products.
Created copy for marketing materials and product documentation.

responsebase.title: Co-founder
duties: Co-founded a direct marketing company specializing in email marketing.
Managed business development and client relations.

euniverse.title: Product Manager
duties: Developed online marketing strategies and social media concepts.
Collaborated with team to create innovative web-based products.

myspace.title: Co-founder and President
duties: Co-founded Myspace, one of the first major social networking sites.
Led the company to rapid growth and widespread popularity.
Oversaw product development and user engagement strategies.
Facilitated partnerships with artists and influencers.

rocketfrog.title: Advisor
duties: Advised on social media strategies for a Facebook gaming application.
Provided insights on user engagement and product development.

photography.title: Photographer
duties: Traveling globally to capture landscape and cultural photography.
Building a portfolio and sharing work on social media platforms.
Engaging with the photography community and followers.

myspace_launch.name: Launch of Myspace
myspace_launch.description: Co-founded and launched Myspace, a pioneering social networking platform that quickly gained millions of users worldwide.

myspace_music.name: Development of Myspace Music
myspace_music.description: Expanded Myspace's platform to include Myspace Music, allowing artists to share music and connect with fans.

rocketfrog_advisory.name: Advisory Role at RocketFrog Interactive
rocketfrog_advisory.description: Joined RocketFrog Interactive as an advisor to provide expertise in social media and user engagement for their Facebook gaming application.

photography_portfolio.name: Landscape and Cultural Photography
photography_portfolio.description: Pursued passion in photography, traveling globally to capture diverse landscapes and cultures, sharing work on social media.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in English and Rhetoric
